remarks: The ` ZZ ` ring homomorphism is zero only at multiples of the characteristic.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Sep-2015.)
statement:
chrcl.c $e |- C = ( chr ` R ) $.
chrid.l $e |- L = ( ZRHom ` R ) $.
chrid.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
chrdvds $p |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( C || N <-> ( L ` N ) = .0. ) ) $.
